Body:
util = UtilityFunction(kind='poi', kappa=1.0, xi=0.0001)
episilon = 0.01
y_max = 2.0
max_arg = acq_max(util.utility, GP, y_max, bounds=np.array([[0, 1], [0, 1]]
    ), random_state=ensure_rng(0), n_iter=200)
_, brute_max_arg = brute_force_maximum(MESH, GP, kind='poi', kappa=1.0, xi=
    0.0001)
assert all(abs(brute_max_arg - max_arg) < episilon)
